document_data.name: Bheren
document_data.mainbody: '''Bheren''' was an [[elven]] man that lived in the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] during the midâ€”14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He was described by his niece as being real mean. He was not above committing violence to animals.
document_data.Possessions: Among his possessions, Bheren owned a ''+1 [[cloak of protection]]''.
document_data.Relationships: Bheren had a niece named [[Petrine]] who had a pet [[cat]] named [[Angel (cat)|Angel]] that he could not stand.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Petrine ran away from her Bheren's home in the [[Baldur's Gate/Upper City|Upper City]]. Much to his dismay, she did not take her cat with her.
